page.title: 11Home Life_A Typical Saturday
page.content: I am ten and live at Lentran, Inverness. I get up at 7 am on Saturday and wander about in my night clothes until mummy calls me to empty the dishwasher. Then she tells me to get dressed and have breakfast. I rarely have breakfast so I go and clean my tack.Then Mummy asks me what I had for breakfast. I just ignore her.Then I ride my pony and come back for lunch, which is usually two sandwhches and a drink. After Lunch I play for a while then, go for another ride. Have tea ,watch T.V. My favourite programme is Dynasty.Then we have supper, which is pizza and chips. I turn on my mummys hot blanket, and I go to bed at 9.30 pm.
